job_title: Mobile App Development Internship in Pune, Mumbai
required_skills: Android, Firebase,Flutter, React Native
job_description:
Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include
 Work closely with our experienced app developers to design and implement cutting-edge mobile applications using Flutter, Android, React Native, and other technologies
 Collaborate with the team to ensure seamless integration of Firebase and other back-end services for enhanced functionality and user experience
 Participate in code reviews and debugging sessions to identify and resolve any issues or bugs that may arise during the development process
 Assist in the creation and maintenance of technical documentation for future reference and knowledge sharing within the team
 Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and advancements in mobile app development to contribute innovative ideas and solutions
 Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance checks to ensure the final product meets the highest standards of performance, reliability, and user satisfaction
 Participate in team meetings and discussions, providing valuable input and suggestions to improve overall app development processes and strategies

About Company: Our sole aim at MentorBoxx is to bridge the gap between universities & industries. We select 30 students every month to regularly interact with the right industry experts, work on live industry projects, and grasp as much industry knowledge as possible.,

required_skills: Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Tracking, Tagging, Collaboration, Content Writing,Data Annotation, Labeling, Generating Prompts, AIML, Annotating Data, 2D3D Bounding Boxes, Image Labeling, Video Labeling, Fastpaced Environment
job_description:
The role entitles tracking, annotation, labeling, and generating prompts & contents for datasets for training the machine learning algorithms. The Data Annotation Specialist has the responsibility to create & curate sets of data specifically created for computer vision & future technologies by using a combination of tracking, annotation, labeling, and generating prompts & content on images, videos, or audio. As a member of the Data Annotation team, you will help us Annotate data for use within a larger machine learning & AI/ML framework. You will be part of a great international team of scientists & professionals who bring cutting-edge technology in verticals like Autonomous Driving to the auto industry as well as working for industries like Retail, Medi-tech, Agri-tech, Gen AI, etc. that will all benefit from machine learning & ai in the near future. joining our team means playing an integral role in bettering the world with science & technology.

Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include
 Accurately label and annotate data in all formats before it reaches the end customer.
 Annotate and label 2D/3D bounding boxes for various industries.
 Tag and track while working on sports annotation.
 Collaborate with teammates, label images, and provide feedback to clients" engineers and data scientists to improve tools and algorithms.
 Write content while viewing images and videos to train the next level of ChatGPT.
 Work in a fast-paced environment that requires high accuracy, attention, and detail.

 Work on timely and accurate billing to clients

 Work & mediate between investors, accountants, shareholders, team members & lawyers

job_description: Engineering Interns learn how to do their job by completing tasks as assigned by supervisors. Typical functions highlighted on an Engineering Intern example resume are reviewing engineering plans, writing reports, researching engineering solutions, implementing company procedures, performing tests to determine construction quality, and offering assistance to non-technical staff. Those looking to work as Engineering Interns should showcase in their resumes technical skills, a willingness to learn, the ability to follow instructions, teamwork, flexibility, and computer competences. Most Engineering Interns are enrolled students pursuing a degree in an engineering field.

job_description:
Job Title: Senior Sales Intern CTC: Non-Metro Locations: 12,000/month + Incentives 
 Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad: 15,000/month + Incentives 
 Eligibility Criteria: Device Requirement: Must have an Android mobile device. 
 Skills Required:Strong communication skills. 
 Smart, presentable, and self-motivated. 
 
 Key Responsibilities: Lead Generation: Generate leads through outbound calls and self-references. 
 Effectively manage leads and ensure that hot leads are passed on to the Venue Manager. 
 Follow up regularly until leads are successfully converted. 
 Client Engagement: Inform prospective clients about the company and its presentation programs. 
 Meet incoming venue clients and assess their financial planning needs. 
 Product Presentation: Present tailored financial products to clients based on their requirements. 
 Recommend suitable products and convincingly explain their benefits to clients. 
 Sales Documentation: Collect policy-related documents and cheques from clients. 
 Submit collected documents to the venue in charge promptly. 
 Client Relationship Management: Build and nurture long-term relationships with clients. 
 Provide exceptional after-sales services, including assistance with claim settlements. 
 Cross-Selling & Upselling: Proactively cross-sell and upsell financial products to existing customers. 
 Reporting & MIS: Maintain records of leads, appointments, and conversions. 
 Generate and share regular MIS reports to track performance. 
 
 Why Join Us Gain hands-on experience in financial product sales. 
 Attractive incentives to reward high performance. 
 Opportunity to build a strong foundation in financial planning and client management.

required_skills: online lead generation, event management, lead generation, marketing,
job_description:
[bold] ABOUT COMPANY! ABOUT COMPANY! [bold] Hindustan Times (Shine.com) Hindustan Times (Shine.com) is India's Leading Online Job and Recruitment Portal - Search & Apply for Latest Job Vacancies across Top Companies in India.
Shine.com is the most innovative and second largest online job portal in India. Founded in 2008, over the past decade, Shine.com has become a prominent name in the recruitment industry. The popularity of the portal is evident from the fact that it has crossed the 3.4 crore candidate landmark and has more than 3 lakh latest job vacancies from leading companies on the site. Shine.com connects jobseekers and recruiters by accurately matching candidate profiles to the relevant job openings through an advanced 2-way matching technology.
 
While most job portals only focus on getting candidates the next job, Shine focuses on the entire career growth of candidates. To this end, Shine has launched Shine Learning- Indias largest career skills site for working professionals with over 500+ courses & certifications. As the industry shifts towards mobile, Shine.com is leading the transition and is the fastest growing job portal on mobile devices, witnessing a 100% YOY growth in mobile traffic and also offers on-the-go jobs through the Shine Job Search App. Shine works closely to bridge the gap between talent & opportunities and offers end-to-end recruitment solutions. 
 
Shine Job Fair brings candidates and top employers under one roof. While Shine HR Conclave brings top HR leaders to share insights on latest trends, innovations & best practices in the HR industry. Shine also has a large reach through its print product, Shine Jobs the Tuesday Job supplement of Hindustan Times making it the only job portal with an integrated print and online offering. We're excited to announce an opportunity for 2 [bold] talented interns talented interns to join our team for a 6 [bold] -month internship -month internship program! If you're a [bold] 3rd-year student 3rd-year student with at least [bold] one previous internship experience one previous internship experience , wed love to hear from you!  [bold] Stipend: Stipend: 10,000/month

Skill-Building: Get hands-on experience in data collection, analysis, and research tools. Mentorship: Collaborate with industry experts and receive valuable guidance. Strategic Exposure: See how your insights drive decisions.

Company Description

RadixVision Services is dedicated to transforming businesses with innovative service solutions in Bhopal. Our team specializes in delivering customized strategies that drive growth, streamline operations, and enhance customer experiences. With a focus on problem-solving and industry expertise, we help clients stay ahead in a competitive market by optimizing processes, leveraging technology, and implementing strategic initiatives.

Role Description

This is a full-time hybrid role for a Business Development Intern at RadixVision Services. The intern will be responsible for tasks such as lead generation, market research, customer service, and communication. While the role is primarily located in Bhopal, there is flexibility for some remote work.

Qualifications
 Analytical Skills and Market Research
 Communication and Customer Service
 Lead Generation
 Strong problem-solving abilities
 Ability to work independently and in a team
 Experience with CRM software is a plus
 Pursuing or completed a degree in Business, Marketing, or related field,

required_skills: Database Management, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript,Nodejs, Nextjs, AWS Services, Typescript, Responsive Design, Code Quality, Best Practices
job_description:
At Quinx, we are dedicated to revolutionizing project-based learning by providing a solution that empowers students to explore, collaborate and create meaningful projects aligned with their interests. We are passionate about enabling students to develop skills through hands-on project experiences, fostering teamwork, and addressing challenges within the realm of project-based learning.

Position : Web Developer (Full stack) Intern / Full time

Location : Bengaluru

Duration : 6 Months

Stipend : 6k - 10k per month (based on performance)

Experience : Prior work experience and clean & scalable coding style is a plus

Skills & Requirements:

1. Node.js and Next.js (Back-End):

Proficiency in Node.js for server-side logic and API development.

Extensive knowledge of Next.js for server-rendered React applications, including routing, data fetching, and static site generation.

2. AWS Services:

Proficiency in AWS services relevant to DevOps, including but not limited to EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFront, and IAM for infrastructure management.

3. Database Management:

Knowledge of database systems, especially with NoSQL databases like DynamoDB or MongoDB.

4. HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), Typescript and Responsive Design:

Strong foundation in HTML5 and CSS3, responsive design principles, and CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.

Mastery in modern JavaScript features (ES6+) and its application in both front-end and back-end development.

5.Code Quality & Best Practices:

Adherence to clean code practices, code reviews, writing maintainable and scalable code, and implementing best practices for performance optimization. Should be able to Document the code properly and be familiar with Jira.

Responsibilities:

As a backend web developer these are the primary tasks which you will be working on in phases.

Back-End Development:

Design, develop, and maintain server-side logic using Node.js, handling requests and building APIs to support front-end functionalities.

Utilize Next.js for server-rendered React applications, implementing routing, data fetching, and server-side rendering for optimized user experiences.

Collaborate with the Machine Learning team to integrate the ML & DL models with the app.

Database Management: Architect and manage databases, integrating them into the back-end using appropriate libraries and ensuring smooth data operations.

Code Quality and Best Practices: Uphold coding standards and best practices, conduct code reviews, and contribute to creating scalable, maintainable, and efficient codebase. Should also maintain proper code documentation.

Monitoring and Optimization: Deploy and manage infrastructure. Monitor system performance, troubleshoot issues and optimize application performance across the stack. Implement caching strategies, performance profiling, and scaling techniques for optimal performance.

Apart from the common perks of stipend, certificate and PPO chances, this opportunity opens you a door to contribute meaningfully under a startup environment to shape the future of project-based learning.

Job Types: Fresher, Internship
Contract length: 6 months

Location Type:
 In-person

Ability to commute/relocate:
 Bengaluru, Karnataka: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)

Application Question(s):
 Declaration: I have read the Job description and would like to apply for 6 months onsite intern at Quinx (Bengaluru) with the provided stipend range of 6k-10k pm.

Education:
 Bachelor's (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Speak with the employer
+91 7338033341,

required_skills: Onboarding,Recruitment Support, Employee Records Management
job_description:
Job Title: HR Intern

Job Description:

We are looking for a proactive and enthusiastic HR Intern to join our Human Resources team. As an HR Intern, you will support the HR department in various tasks, gaining hands-on experience in a wide range of HR functions. This internship is a great opportunity for someone looking to start their career in Human Resources and develop a strong foundation in HR practices.

Key Responsibilities:
 Recruitment Support: Assist in the recruitment process by posting job openings, screening resumes, conducting initial candidate outreach, and scheduling interviews. Help in maintaining the recruitment database and tracking applicant status.
 Onboarding: Assist in the onboarding process for new hires, including preparing onboarding materials, coordinating orientation sessions, and ensuring all necessary documentation is completed.
 Employee Records Management: Help in maintaining and organizing employee records, ensuring that all files are up-to-date and compliant with company policies and legal requirements.

Job Type: Internship

Work Location: In person,

required_skills: Data Collection, Data Management, Data Analysis, Database Maintenance, Reporting, Documentation, Written Communication,Outreach Strategies, Tool Utilization
job_description:
ViralChilly, a unit of Digiastic LLP, is recognized as one of the best startups to work for in Jaipur. We are a digital marketing agency with a people-centric approach, working with reputed clients like Canva, Adobe, Stillio, and more.We are seeking a motivated and enthusiastic Outreach Intern to assist with our outreach and engagement efforts. The ideal candidate should be eager to learn about outreach strategies and stakeholder engagement.

Key Responsibilities:
 Data Collection & Management: Assist in collecting and maintaining outreach-related data from various sources.
 Data Analysis: Analyse outreach data to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
 Database Maintenance: Help ensure data accuracy and integrity within our databases.
 Reporting: Prepare regular reports on outreach activities and outcomes.
 Support Outreach Strategies: Collaborate with the team to provide data insights that inform and refine outreach strategies and tactics.
 Documentation: Document data collection processes and methodologies to ensure consistency and reliability in future data handling.
 Tool Utilization: Use data analysis tools and software (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets, data visualization tools) to manage and interpret data effectively.

Qualifications:
 Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a bachelor's degree
 Strong written communication skills.

Things You Should Know
 Work hours: 9 AM to 6:30 PM, Monday to Friday.
 30-minute lunch break + 15-minute tea break.
 Work from office.
 Stipend based on performance and interview.

 Day shift
 Monday to Friday

required_skills: social media, graphic design, video editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, communication,web management, video shooting, organizational skills, creative mindset, attention to detail
job_description:
Job Title: Creative Marketing and Multimedia Intern

Location: Hastaakshar Design Studio, Mayapuri Phase 1

Stipend: 12K to 15K INR per month

Start Date: ASAP

About Us:

Primary Strokes and Jomacs are vibrant businesses led by Daksh Kalra, spanning digital art, music production, and educational content. Youll work in our 2000 sqft design studio, an environment crafted to stimulate creativity and innovation.

Who Youll Work With:

Directly under the mentorship of Ar. Daksh Kalra, this role is ideal for creative individuals looking to engage deeply with entrepreneurial and artistic projects.

Key Responsibilities:

 Content Management: Manage and schedule content across platforms like Instagram and YouTube.

 Web and Email Management: Update our Wix site and manage email campaigns.

 Graphic and Video Production: Create visual content and edit videos, including video shooting and editing skills, preferably with Adobe Premiere Pro.

 Lead Management: Handle inquiries and coordinate lead follow-ups.

 Networking and Promotion: Participate in pitches and represent our brands in various settings.

What You Will Gain:

 In-depth learning and experimentation across multiple disciplines.

 Direct mentorship from an experienced entrepreneur and artist.

 The opportunity to impact diverse projects combining art, music, and education.

Skills and Qualifications:

 Proficiency in social media, graphic design, and web management tools.

 Strong video shooting and editing skills, particularly in Adobe Premiere Pro.

 Excellent communication and organizational skills.

 A creative mindset with attention to detail.

Education:

 Open to current students or recent graduates in Marketing, Graphic Design, Media Studies, or related fields.

How to Apply:

Please send your resume, a cover letter, and any relevant work samples/portfolio to ar.dakshkalra@gmail.com . Ensure your application highlights your skills and experiences that align with the responsibilities of this role.,
